Class NutchDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.indexer.NutchDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,NutchField>>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class NutchDocument
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,NutchField>>
    A NutchDocument is the unit of indexing.
